name: ccrypt
long_description:
# Cookbook ccrypt

Secure encryption and decryption of files and streams [ccrypt](http://ccrypt.sourceforge.net/)

## Usage

    cookbook 'ccrypt', '~> 1.0.0'

Just include `ccrypt` in your node's `run_list`:

```json
{
  "name":"my_node",
  "run_list": [
    "recipe[ccrypt]"
  ]
}
```
